category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 30 (Safety Committee)
contents: Article 30 (Safety Committee) The Safety Committee shall respond to the Chairman's advice on the following matters. 1. Matters pertaining to the direction of safety enhancement related to sports activities 2. Matters pertaining to the establishment and promotion of comprehensive safety plans for sports club facilities and various competitions, etc. 3. Matters pertaining to the prevention of various safety accidents and establishment of an institutional foundation 4. Other safety committee Matters submitted by the Chairman after being recognized as being in accordance with the functions of [This Article Newly Inserted on July 5, 2023]
